description:
Quietly situated on level seven enjoying stunning city view, this north-east facing apartment is one not to be missed offering a family and pet friendly environment.

The complex offers a heated swimming pool, spacious meeting room, on-site building managers, Gym, lifts and an assortment of stores and cafes. Located within close proximity to Macquarie Shopping Centre, Macquarie University, Macquarie Park Metro Station, local/City buses, this property presents an ideal opportunity to both home buyers and astute investors.

The building takes into careful consideration the site's surrounding ecological context, its proximity to the riparian zone and delivers a contextual built form that responds to the site and the evolving future character of Macquarie Park.

` Quietly situated on level 7 enjoying stunning city view
` European style kitchen with marble bench and quality appliances
` Good-sized master bedroom with built-in wardrobes
` Second bedroom with wardrobes also works as a home office
` Covered entertaining balcony allows ample sunlight from a northerly aspect
` Easy care investment attracting solid rental returns ultra low strata
` Moments to Macquarie University, trains and city bound buses

Privately perched in this well-maintained complex, all bedrooms and living areas enjoy abundances of natural light, creating your very own private oasis whilst having parks and transport only moments away. Exhibiting an exceptional opportunity for first-home buyers, investors or young families who seek the perfect balance of convenience, lifestyle and potential returns, it is a perfect opportunity to make this apartment your home.

Contact: Felix 0430 230 916 Claire 0434 972 960
